sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import {Modal as BsModal, Button, Form} from 'react-bootstrap'

function Modal({show, closeFunction, item}) {
    const [current, setCurrent] = useState(item)

    const handleChange = (e) => {
      console.log(current)
      let name = e.target.name;
      let value = e.target.value;
      const newItem = {...current, [name]: value}
      setCurrent(newItem)
    } 

    return (
        <BsModal show={show}>
        <BsModal.Header closeButton>
          <BsModal.Title>New Task</BsModal.Title>
        </BsModal.Header>
        <BsModal.Body>
            {/* New Task Form */}
            <Form >
              <Form.Group>
                  <Form.Control 
                  value={current.title} 
                  type="text" placeholder="Title" 
                  title='todo-title'
                  onChange={handleChange}
                  />
              </Form.Group>
              <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                  <Form.Check type="checkbox" label="Completed"/>
              </Form.Group>
            </Form>
        </BsModal.Body>
        <BsModal.Footer>
          <Button variant="secondary" onClick={closeFunction}>
            Close
          </Button>
          <Button variant="primary">
            Add Task
          </Button>
        </BsModal.Footer>
      </BsModal>
    )
}

export default Modal
